reviews.review: Arguably the Russo Brothers' masterpiece, Avengers: Infinity War finally shows how awesome Thanos is with him surely showing his status as the greatest MCU villain to date and a spectacular performance by Josh Brolin, the rest of the film is pure Marvel magic: excellent performances, incredible humor, wonderful action sequences, a lot of emotional moments,  plus bringing every iconic MCU hero on screen at the same time against a gigantic threath, this movie virtually has no flaws and is amongst the greatest movies ever made.
I mean, it was fine. The whole thing was basically about cramming all of the different franchises together... And then everyone dies.
Best marvel movie by a mile
I love Black Panther more. Good movie though
As classic as the original combining years of anticipation. Worth the hype.
A truly great movie! Itâ€™s more fleshed out and Thanos is more awesome in it!!

This movie was by far the worst avengers movie. It was so over hyped and under-delivered. The battle was completely underwhelming. The ending was not flattering at all and the movie is just a shamble of what could have been a much better movie. What a shame.

Finally we have a movie where the heroes dont win which in my book is a big plus. We get a good villain with a noble goal but horrifying means to achieve it and some very nice action sequences. However except for the villain the entire movie has almost no depth it is an action sequence after another action sequence with a few fillers. The ending of the movie was extremely predictable. The decision making of some of our heroes was so stupid i almost left the cinema back in 2018 and i had to pause the movie when rewatching it. Vision is absolutely useless, even though he's comopsed of  2 great minds vibranium and an infinity stone. Sadly these flaws ruined the movie for me.

It does very well for itself even though this is basically half of a movie. It smartly splits up the heroes up to create humorous and emotional groups while building it up for a dramatic finish. It is pretty fast-paced so it is very thrilling but also has some significant flaws which overall results in a very successful film mostly meeting its massive ambitions.
Extremely well paced action, with great emotional moments
